definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: He suggests shading plants with bed sheets, shade cloth or brush -- in other words, sticks and branches.
sentences.chinese: 或者用灌木叢，換句話說，也就是枝條。

sentences.english: Puma fur was found clinging to bushes.
sentences.chinese: 灌木叢中也發現了粘在上面的美洲獅毛。

sentences.english: Volunteers were in the bush all the time and didn't let on.
sentences.chinese: 志願軍戰士們一直在灌木叢中，沒有暴露目標。

sentences.english: Then, tie them and leave them in the deep woods.
sentences.chinese: 接着，把他們捆上丟進灌木叢深處。

sentences.english: They hid themselves behind some bushed for fear that the enemy should find them.
sentences.chinese: 他們躲在灌木叢後面，以防敵人會發現他們。

sentences.english: The sudden noise in the bushes startled her horse.
sentences.chinese: 灌木叢中突然發出的怪聲使她的馬驚跳起來。

sentences.english: TASTING NOTES : Aromas of thyme, rosemary and other herbs typical of the "garrigue"(Mediterranean scrubland) can be detected in the bouquet.
sentences.chinese: 氣味帶有百里香，迷失香和地中海灌木叢香氣。

sentences.english: Scrub jays can trick you, researchers say.
sentences.chinese: 研究者發現，灌木叢裏的鳥兒也能把你騙到。

sentences.english: We kicked the door and hid behind the busher.
sentences.chinese: 我們踢了幾下門，然後藏到灌木叢後。

sentences.english: They shot poisoned arrows from behind the thick bushes.
sentences.chinese: 他們從茂密的灌木叢後射出了毒箭。

sentences.english: They also cleared bushland, dug wells and worked as market gardeners.
sentences.chinese: 他們還開墾灌木叢，挖水井，並從事市場園丁的工作。

sentences.english: The cowboy lassoed a calf which was beside the bush.
sentences.chinese: 牧童套住了一隻在灌木叢邊的小牛。

sentences.english: In the thicket he found only frosted leaves and green stalks coated with snowflakes and ice.
sentences.chinese: 在灌木叢，他發現有磨砂綠莖葉和塗有雪花和冰。

sentences.english: The bushes in the mouth bird flowers habitat raising An Nian.
sentences.chinese: 那灌木叢裏的知更雀就在叼起的花蕊裏棲養安年。

sentences.english: We were in the shrubbery at the end of the lime-walk.
sentences.chinese: 我們是在菩提幽徑盡頭的灌木叢林裏。

definition: (bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
Lishu county in Siping 四平, Jilin/Lishu district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
to be shaded or concealed by foliage/to conceal/hidden/covert/shade (of a tree)
